intro: Trichosanthes tetragonosperma, commonly known as the four-cornered栝楼, is a flowering plant native to Southeast Asia. It is a member of the Cucurbitaceae family, which includes cucumbers and gourds. The plant produces large, yellow flowers and elongated, ribbed fruits that are typically harvested when mature. Its botanical features include palmate leaves with five to seven lobes and a distinctive, angular fruit structure. The plant is often cultivated for its ornamental value and has traditional uses in herbal medicine.
